personal_information.name: Abdulrahman Ali Muhmmed
personal_information.title: Software Engineer
personal_information.summary: Android Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable, secure mobile apps in fintech and e-commerce. Proven track record of delivering high-quality features used by millions. Hands-on Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP), and secure app development using DexGuard and RASP. Passionate about clean architecture, performance optimization, and crafting intuitive user experiences.
